descriptionHtml:
23/06/14 - v1.0

Whiterun Improved Breezehome is my first mod and with it, i tried to make a better Breezehome for a better organization for your gear.

This mod adds: Four more weapon hold, one more chest next to the bed to store things and an enchanting table so you don't have to run from the warmaiden to dragon's reach to enchant your gear

Bugs known:
For some reason the new weapon hold doesn't work sometimes i'm working on it,

--------------------------------------
30/06/14 - Update v1.1
I decided to remove the weapon hold and replace it with weapon racks, now they work as intended, also made some correction to light sources, now there are no more non sense light sources, the lightning now are emitted from its right source, eg: candle/fire etc, and shadows are correctly proyected.

If you like ir endorse it ;)

Later*


SnW
author: SnW
